lines.text: create ints i , j , k , l , and n
lines.code: int i , j , k , l , n ;

lines.text: for i = 1 and j = n / 2 to n / 2 + 1 by incrementing by i and decreasing j by 1
for i = n / 2 and j = 1 while i > = 1 by decreasing i by 1 and incrementing j
for k = 1 to ( 2 * i ) - 1 , display ' D '

mod_code: for ( int i = n / 2 and j = 1 ; i >= 1 ; i -- )
errors.err_msg: lvalue required as left operand of assignment

mod_code: cin >> N ;
errors.err_msg: ‘N’ was not declared in this scope
